title: Why cant i get Champion Mastery Tokens in twisted treeline?
body: Even in ranked 3v3's when i get an S- or higher i dont get a mastery 6 token (on champions already mastery 5)

replies.body: Because apparently normal SR has a "higher competitive bar" than ranked TT, and not rewarding TT players for good play will somehow address that.
Let's try to change that in 2017.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=K8wuR6dW,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-12-17T01:03:16.542+0000)
>
> Let's try to change that in 2017.

dont think it changed :/

Per the [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide, tokens are currently only available in Summoner's Rift.  I don't have any information on changes to that, but be sure to update the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for any news.  Good luck!
